meanings.sent1: In the dark forest, the glimmerings of fireflies lit up the night.
meanings.sent2: The glimmerings of the distant stars were visible in the clear sky.
meanings.sent3: The glimmerings of hope shone through the despair, giving them strength.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the shadows, the glimmerings of the lantern guided their path.
meanings.sent5: The glimmerings of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.

meanings.definition: A slight indication or suggestion of something
meanings.sent1: She noticed the glimmerings of a smile on his face as he read the letter.
meanings.sent2: The glimmerings of a plan began to form in her mind as she listened.
meanings.sent3: The glimmerings of mischief in his eyes hinted at his playful nature.
meanings.sent4: Among the clutter, the glimmerings of a solution started to emerge.
meanings.sent5: The glimmerings of autumn were visible in the changing colors of the leaves.
